"Meri": "Thanks for helping me out here. Ilma should be back at the research laboratory."
"You know, the one we originally found him in. Do you remember?"
"The lab that's off to the side of that tunnel in Lost Central."
"Everyones's been so helpful to us since then, but we're just so used to doing our own thing, you know?"
"Ilma calls us regularly, but it's been a while since he's come back to the lodge."
"Even if I wanted to go and visit him, I don't know how I'd do on my own out there."
"I WOULD have asked one of my brothers, but they aren't responding to my calls either! Rude."
"So yeah, that's why I'm glad I was able to ask you. Thanks a bunch!"
